director.name: 玛丽安娜·奥德诺 Mariana Otero

introduction: 在法国和比利时的边界，有一个地方，专为受心理问题困扰及被社会遗弃的儿童所建。在这里，有总是怀疑自己身体的艾莉森，有一直转圈转到摔倒的艾万尼，也有没办法开口说话的阿米娜。在这里工作的大人们日复一日，试图解开每个孩子身上隐藏的谜团，并根据不同情况，帮孩子们找到解决问题、平静生活下去的方法。透过他们的故事，我们能够看到他们眼中单纯的世界。《开阔蓝天》A ciel ouvert导演：Mariana OteroFrance/110min/2013/剧情片----------------------A ciel ouvert《开阔蓝天》A ciel ouvertAlysson considers her body with mistrust. Evanne spins and twists until he collapses. Amina can't manage to make words come out of her mouth. At the border between France and Belgium there exists a special place which takes care of psychologically and socially challenged children. Day after day, the adults working there try to understand the enigma that each of these children represent and invent, case by case, without ever imposing anything, solutions that will help them live peaceful lives. As we get to know their stories, A ciel ouvert offers us their singular vision of the world.Director: Mariana OteroFrance/110min/2013
